Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Armitage
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, Fullerton, and Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Armitage.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays, Limited Service between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription:
Red Line Delays, Limited Service between Howard & Belmont; CTA personnel are making repairs to service.
Service will resume on alt. tracks as soon as possible.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and 95th at this time.

A Shuttle Train is available between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

CTA personnel are making repairs to the service; repairs are estimated to be competed this evening.

Red Line service will resume on alternate tracks as soon as possible.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line toward the Loop has been temporarily suspended due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line toward the Loop has been temporarily suspended due to fire department activity.

 Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Belmont  to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
